member.name: T:Microsoft.Xaml.Interactions.Core.GoToStateAction

member.remarks: If the property is set, this action will attempt to change the state of the targeted element. If it is not set, the action walks the element tree in an attempt to locate an alternative target that defines states. and are two common results.

member.summary: Gets or sets the location of the sound file. This is used to set the source property of a . This is a dependency property.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Xaml.Interactions.Media.PlaySoundAction
member.summary: An action that will play a sound to completion.
member.remarks: This action is intended for use with short sound effects that don't need to be stopped or controlled. If you are trying to create a music player or game, it may not meet your needs.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xaml.Interactions.Core.ResourceHelper.GetString(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: The string table is shared between managed and native implementations of the Behaviors SDK. This method is a quick, one parameter only version of string.Format() that uses the {0} syntax for replacement.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Xaml.Interactions.Core.IncrementalUpdateBehavior
member.summary: A behavior that allows incremental updating of and contents to support faster updating. By attaching this behavior to elements in the used by these views, some of the updates can be deferred until there is render time available, resulting in a smoother experience.
